summary: A gang of young and ruthless bikers terrorizes the streets of Rome for no other reason than kicks and to kill their copious amounts of spare time.

director: Directors: Massimo Felisatti (as Ferrara), Sergio Grieco (as Segri)
title: I violenti di Roma bene
